__e: Oh, that sounds like a party.
Why should I spend my honeymoon with you?
Can't believe I'm spending my wedding night with you.
The point is, I did not know that it was your car... and I certainly did not know about your daughter's wedding.
It's a wedding photo... of you and some woman.
After the ceremony, I'll let you do that thing I promised you could do on our wedding night that I lied about and didn't let you do that I'm probably still lying about now.
I'm not exactly the kind of girl who sat around fantasizing about her wedding day, and if I had, it probably would have looked a little less this.
Registering for your wedding is the most important moment of your lives.
Oh. The wedding was a success, yes.
The happiest day of my life was the day we got married.
I'm not sure this wedding is a good idea, to say the least.
That's my little wedding gift to you and what's-his-name.
Nuptial night for this girl is also over.
- I'm not interested in waiting till our wedding night to see if the sex between us is any good.
It's your wedding night, not mine.
But that doesn't mean we have to wait for our wedding night.
Your sister, on her wedding day... never saw anything so beautiful.
